msg: This is an empty revision for padding.

author: mrglavas
msg: The NOTICE file is ASCII not binary.

author: mrglavas
msg: Include the new balance-syntax-trees feature in the Xerces features array.
The XIncludeHandler uses this array to copy the features of a parser

author: mrglavas
msg: Adding a feature which controls whether the syntax trees generated
while parsing a DTD are balanced. Turning on this feature prevents
deep recursion for large content models. We could extend this to the
schema syntax trees in the future.
